Recommendations: 1. Enhance the policy on preservation, general care, and welfare of the library materials
2. Have functional Library Integrated System that generates all the necessary services and reports.
3. Provide a separate area and additional computer units for online research purposes of the library and for its Information Technology Center.
4. Consider rearranging the library set-up to maximize the use of the area
5. Continuously enhance the collections per curricular offerings.
6. An additional air-conditioning unit may be installed in the library to make the place more conducive to learning.
7. Continuously enhance the Filipiniana collections of the Library
